titleStmt.title: A famouse cronicle of oure time, called Sleidanes Commentaries concerning the state of religion and common wealth, during the raigne of the Emperour Charles the fift, with the argumentes set before euery booke, conteyninge the summe or effecte of the booke following. Translated out of Latin into Englishe, by Ihon Daus. Here vnto is added also an apology of the authoure.
De statu religionis et reipublicae, Carolo Quinto Caesare, commentarii. English
titleStmt.author: Sleidanus, Johannes, 1506-1556.

titleStmt.title: A famouse cronicle of oure time, called Sleidanes Commentaries concerning the state of religion and common wealth, during the raigne of the Emperour Charles the fift, with the argumentes set before euery booke, conteyninge the summe or effecte of the booke following. Translated out of Latin into Englishe, by Ihon Daus. Here vnto is added also an apology of the authoure.
De statu religionis et reipublicae, Carolo Quinto Caesare, commentarii. English

Daus, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Daie, for Nicholas Englande,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De statu religionis et reipublicae, Carolo Quinto Caesare, comentarii.
A later state of the edition dated 25 Sept. 1560, with cancel leaves 3Q2.3.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
